content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARMCD
      operator: equal_to
      value: AGEMAX
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: non_empty
    - any:
        - name: TSVAL
          operator: not_matches_regex
          value: ^P(?!$)(\d+(?:\.\d+)?Y)?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?M)?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?W)?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?D)?(T(?=\d)(\d+(?:\.\d+)?H)?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?M)?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?S)?)?$
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0270
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when TSPARMCD = 'AGEMAX' and TSVAL ^= null and TSVAL does
  not conform to ISO 8601
Outcome:
  Message: TSVAL does not conform to ISO 8601
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0270
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: When the trial summary parameter is AGEMAX, then TSVAL
                  should have a value expressed as an ISO8601 time duration (e.g.,
                  P43Y for 43 years old or P6M for 6 months old).
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 7.4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when TSPARMCD = 'AGEMAX' and TSVAL ^= null and TSVAL does not conform to ISO 8601

Outcome.Message: TSVAL does not conform to ISO 8601

Citations.Cited_Guidance: When the trial summary parameter is AGEMAX, then TSVAL should have a value expressed as an ISO8601 time duration (e.g., P43Y for 43 years old or P6M for 6 months old).
